name: tm21
effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Drain)

flavor_text.sun_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage it deals.
